title: Bran's Battle
description: I'll make her say I doWhen I see an old friend hand his business card to sultry Luna, I want to choke him. She’s too good for him. She doesn’t belong in his strip club.My dark obsession is fueled when I see she takes him up on the offer. A pretty girl like her doesn’t belong on the stage. She should be dancing for my eyes only.When it comes out Luna is a struggling student, I’m determined to help… but Luna has no idea who I am, and even though I can fix her situation, my twisted life is full of danger.If Luna finds out about my real life, she’s going to run. She never agreed to marry a mobster.But even if she tries to get away… there’s not a chance I’m letting go. Not now that I’ve put a ring on her finger…Bran’s Battle is a full-length standalone dark mafia romance, part of the Mafia Heirs Gallaghers series. All books can be enjoyed as standalones.
author: Raven  Scott
